name: Palomar Display Products
overview: Palomar Display Products, Inc. engages in the development and integration of displays and computer systems for demanding applications in harsh environments. The company offers military airborne display products, such as avionics, cockpit, multi function, and liquid crystal control; and military ground vehicle display products, including biocular image control units, firepower enhancement program biocular displays, DTAS, second generation hire display units, and anti-tank guided missile weapons system displays. Its products are used on various weapon systems, such as tracked and wheeled vehicles in mission critical military applications; and on aircrafts and helicopters, as well as on ground vehicle and airborne applications. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Carlsbad, California. Palomar Display Products, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Palomar Technologies, Inc.
